page.title: 19A RISILEY PARTY(1)
page.content: Legal maturity is now reached at the age of eighteen, but we prefer to celebrate 'coming-of-age' at the old legal age of twenty one. So on July 29th l985 we celebrated the 2lst birthday of our daughter, Jill. A marquee was erected on the lawn, with tables and chairs, a dance floor and disco instruments arranged within. Who was invited? Godparents, relatives, old playmates, school friends from Riseley and Bedford, nursing friends, local farming friends, family friends and past and present vicars of our parish. On arrival each guest was greeted by Jill, offered a glass of sherry and escorted to the marquee. Any gifts presented were placed aside safely.
